explains: adj. 降低身份的；有损人格的
v. 有损……的人格（demean 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: He found it demeaning to work for his former employee.
sentences.cn: 他觉得为自己以前的雇员工作有失体面。

sentences.en: Sarcasm and demeaning remarks have no place in parenting.
sentences.cn: 挖苦和贬损的言语不应用来教育子女。

sentences.en: Attempts to brand the belly dance as an act of seduction are both demeaning and distorting.
sentences.cn: 试图将肚皮舞标榜为一种诱惑行为是贬低和扭曲的。
